001package org.nasdanika.exec.gen;
002
003import java.io.IOException;
004import java.io.InputStream;
005import java.util.ArrayList;
006import java.util.Collection;
007import java.util.List;
008import java.util.Objects;
009import java.util.stream.Collectors;
010
011import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject;
012import org.nasdanika.common.Context;
013import org.nasdanika.common.ExecutionException;
014import org.nasdanika.common.ProgressMonitor;
015import org.nasdanika.common.Reference;
016import org.nasdanika.common.Supplier;
017import org.nasdanika.common.SupplierFactory;
018import org.nasdanika.common.Util;
019import org.nasdanika.emf.EObjectAdaptable;
020import org.nasdanika.exec.Block;
021
022public class BlockSupplierFactoryAdapter extends BlockExecutionParticipantAdapter implements SupplierFactory<InputStream> {
023        
024        public BlockSupplierFactoryAdapter(Block block) {
025                super(block);
026        }
027        
028        @Override
029        public boolean isAdapterForType(Object type) {
030                return type == SupplierFactory.class;
031        }
032        
033        private static class BlockSupplier extends BlockExecutionParticipant<Supplier<InputStream>> implements Supplier<InputStream> {
034        
035                private Reference<Exception> eRef;
036        
037                BlockSupplier(
038                                Supplier<InputStream> tryParticipant,
039                                Supplier<InputStream> catchParticipant,
040                                Supplier<InputStream> finallyParticipant,
041                                Reference<Exception> eRef) {
042                        super(tryParticipant, catchParticipant, finallyParticipant);
043                        this.eRef = eRef;
044                }
045        
046                private InputStream executeTryCatch(ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
047                        try {
048                                return tryParticipant.splitAndExecute(progressMonitor);
049                        } catch (Exception e) {
050                                tryParticipant.splitAndRollback(progressMonitor);
051                                eRef.set(e);
052                                if (catchParticipant == null) {
053                                        throw e;
054                                }
055                                return catchParticipant.splitAndExecute(progressMonitor);
056                        }                       
057                }
058        
059                @Override
060                public InputStream execute(ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
061                        if (finallyParticipant == null) {
062                                return executeTryCatch(progressMonitor);
063                        } 
064                        
065                        InputStream tcResult = null;
066                        Exception ex = null;
067                        InputStream finallyResult = null;
068                        try {
069                                tcResult = executeTryCatch(progressMonitor);
070                        } catch (Exception e) {
071                                ex = e;
072                        } finally {
073                                finallyResult = finallyParticipant.splitAndExecute(progressMonitor);
074                        }
075                        if (ex == null) {
076                                try {
077                                        return Util.join(tcResult, finallyResult);
078                                } catch (IOException e) {
079                                        throw new ExecutionException(e, this);
080                                }
081                        }
082                        throw new ExecutionException(ex, this);                 
083                }
084                
085        }       
086        
087        @Override
088        public Supplier<InputStream> create(Context context) {
089                Reference<Exception> eRef = new Reference<Exception>();
090                Block target = (Block) getTarget();
091                
092                Collection<SupplierFactory<InputStream>> tryBlock = new ArrayList<>();
093                for (EObject tbe: target.getTry()) {
094                        tryBlock.add(Objects.requireNonNull(EObjectAdaptable.adaptToSupplierFactory(tbe, InputStream.class), "Cannot adapt to SupplierFactory: " + tbe));
095                }
096                Supplier<InputStream>  trySupplier = Util.asInputStreamSupplierFactory(tryBlock).create(context);
097                
098                Supplier<InputStream> catchSupplier = null;             
099                if (!target.getCatch().isEmpty()) {
100                        List<SupplierFactory<InputStream>> catchBlock = target.getCatch().stream().map(e -> Objects.requireNonNull(EObjectAdaptable.adaptToSupplierFactory(e, InputStream.class), "Cannot adapt to SupplierFactory: " + e)).collect(Collectors.toList());
101                        catchSupplier = Util.asInputStreamSupplierFactory(catchBlock).contextify(ctx -> createCatchContextSupplier(ctx, eRef)).create(context);
102                }
103                
104                Supplier<InputStream>  finallySupplier = null;
105                if (!target.getFinally().isEmpty()) {
106                        List<SupplierFactory<InputStream>> finallyBlock = target.getFinally().stream().map(e -> Objects.requireNonNull(EObjectAdaptable.adaptToSupplierFactory(e, InputStream.class), "Cannot adapt to SupplierFactory: " + e)).collect(Collectors.toList());
107                        finallySupplier = Util.asInputStreamSupplierFactory(finallyBlock).contextify(ctx -> createCatchContextSupplier(ctx, eRef)).create(context);
108                }               
109                
110                return new BlockSupplier(trySupplier, catchSupplier, finallySupplier, eRef);            
111        }       
112
113}
